content: cutie collar cutie collar is a fancy accessory in one size worked from the neckline down to the outer edge finished with i-cord agata wilk @sznurkami and cords for bonding size one size needles circular needles 4 mm 80 cm for body and 3 5 mm 40 cm or 60 cm for cords suggested yarn 25 g of sunday sandnes garn 235 m / 50 g or fabel by drops 205 m / 50 g or tynn peer gynt sandnes garn 205 m / 50 g held together with 10 g of tynn silk mohair sandnes garn 212 m / 25 g or kid-silk by drops 210 m / 25 g sample knitted with yarns beige sunday sandnes garn in 2650 and tynn silk mohair in colour 2511 red fabel by drops in colour 106 and tynn silk mohair in colour 4008 blue tynn peer gynt sandnes garn in 6046 and tynn silk mohair in colour 6046 agata wilk @sznurkami cutie collar abbreviations rs/ws - right side / wrong side k - knit p - purl st/sts - stitch es yo - yarn over sm - slip marker ssk - slip slip knit - slip 2 stitches knitwise to the right needle slip back to the left needle and knit them together through the back loop to lean decrease to the left k2tog - knit two stitches together to lean decrease to the right tbl - through the back loop pattern cast on 98 stiches on 4 mm 80 cm circular needles work as follows row 1 ws purl all stitches row 2 rs knit all stitches in the meantime place 10 markers *k9 place marker* until there is last 8 sts on the needle k8 row 3 ws purl all sts row 4 rs *k8 yarn over k1 slip marker yo* until there is last 8 stitches k8 you increased 20 stitches and have now 118 stitches on your needles row 5 ws purl all sts row 6 rs knit all sts row 7 ws purl all sts row 8 rs *k until 1 st before marker yo k1 sm yo* 10 times k till the end of row row 9 ws purl all sts row 10 rs knit all sts row 11 ws purl all sts work row < 8 - 11 > 2 more times 3 times in total row 20 rs k2 ssk *k until 1 st before marker yo k1 sm yo* 10 times k until 4 sts before the end of row k2tog k2 row 21 ws purl all sts row 22 rs k2 ssk k until 4 sts before the end of row k2tog k2 row 23 ws purl all sts work row < 20 - 23 > 1 more time 2 times in total row 28 rs remove all markers while working as follows k2 ssk k until 4 sts before the end of row k2tog k2 now you will work i-cord edges on the both sides and outer edge then cords
